feed.title: Squadbusters - News
feed.subtitle: RSS wrapper of Squadbusters inbox News

entry.title: Optional Update for iOS and Android!
entry.content:
An optional update with the following changes is now available!

  • Fixed replays that were not working

  • Fixed characters downgrading to a previous evolution (fixed last Saturday)

    • We are working on reverting the downgraded characters back to the evolution level they had before the issue. Expect a fix soon!

  • Fixed party invites popping up while in Battle

  • Added cooldown for party requests, and delay between party requests pop-ups

  • Implemented a setting to disable ask-to-join party requests

  • Fixed accepting friend invites issue when having more than 1 invite

  • Fixed crashes on foldable devices

  • Fixed the black screen after getting busted during training

  • Changed Battle consumables rewards flying to the Play button instead of the Shop button

  • Fixed the Gem Pass timer not showing up on some screens

  • Fixed an emote that is showing as unlocked at level 0

  • Other small fixes

Make sure to update your game!

entry.title: Global Launch Free Rewards!
entry.content:
New milestone unlocked!

In order to THANK YOU all for supporting the Squad Busters launch, we've added a new milestone to the pre-registration reward track!

If we reach 40M pre-registrations before May 29, this beautiful Deco will be available at launch, and claimable for only a month!

Remember, each new player counts as a new pre-registration. Tell your friends, and let's do this together!

Continue reading - Last Edit: April 26

To celebrate the global release of Squad Busters, unlock FREE and EXCLUSIVE rewards for each pre-registration milestone the community achieves!

HOW IT WORKS

We've got not just one, not two, but FOUR awesome milestones to unlock!

Well, maybe even one more - who knows? üò∂

The more pre-registrations on Google Play & the App Store, the more the rewards for everyone! The first milestone is at 1 million, and the next milestones will be revealed as we unlock the previous one!

These are the rewards:

  • 10000 Coins

  • El Tigre

  • Chests (Common, Rare, and Epic)

  • Exclusive Global Emote

Pretty cool, huh?

All the unlocked rewards will be available in the game after Global Launch, and will stay in the shop FOR A MONTH!

HOW CAN I CONTRIBUTE?

If you‚Äôre reading this, it means you‚Äôre playing Squad Busters, therefore won‚Äôt have the option to pre-register. But WORRY NOT: every single active player counts towards the progress!

Your mission starts here: Tell your friends, family, neighbors, and pets to pre-register for Squad Busters on Google Play or the App Store, follow the progress of the community effort on the reward tracker, and claim the rewards in ALL games as they unlock!

WAIT, ALL GAMES?

YES! Each milestone will also unlock rewards in all the other Supercell games:

  • Brawl Stars

  • Clash of Clans

  • Clash Royale

  • Boom Beach

  • Hay Day

Make sure to claim your rewards over there too, and be ready for Squad Busters Global Launch on May 29th!

entry.title: Launch trailer: Time to SQUAD UP!
Life's more fun when you SQUAD UP! üêî
Update Patch Notes + Fixes!
entry.content:
MAINTENANCE - JUNE 4,2024

  • Fixed an issue to ensure pre-registration emotes are delivered to Soft Launch players

  • Fixed an issue where Pi√±ata groups appeared empty in the middle of the event

  • Improved the chances of MEGA Unit comebacks, making them more likely when at low Squad sizes

  • Implemented fixes to prevent out-of-sync issues during matches

  • Made server-side improvements

MAINTENANCE - MAY 28, 2024

  • Fix for Pi√±ata member count where was possible to send invites to players who had a full Pi√±ata

  • Squad Journey: reducing Portal Energy requirements in Desert World

  • Win Streak:

    • Bonus Taps: + 2 bonus taps start one level earlier (with 4 wins)

    • Win Streak re-buy reworked caps at 5000 coins at the 10th win

  • 1st position now gives 5 upgrade taps instead of 4

  • Bringing rest of the servers and databases online in preparation for launch day üöÄ

MAINTENANCE - MAY 24, 2024

Pi√±ata Festival fixes:

  • Score updates propagate now correctly

  • Pi√±ata parties can't have more than 5 players anymore

  • Fixed an issue where you could add yourself to the Pi√±ata party

OPTIONAL UPDATE - MAY 23, 2024

  • Fixed various crashes occurring while in Battle

  • Fixed Shop and other minor visual issues

  • Fixed Super Pass rewards info showing incorrect reward amounts

  • Enabled the News section for Traditional Chinese

We are aware of the issues related to the Pi√±ata Festival, and we are working on them. Thanks for the reports!

MAINTENANCE - MAY 22, 2024

  • Fix for Referrals: The link can now be used by any player regardless of their progression level

  • Fix for the game crashing sometimes when opening Spell Event

MAINTENANCE - MAY 21, 2024

  • Fix for future content showing up in the shop too early

  • Removed Ice World maps from Squad League

UPDATE - MAY 21, 2024 Squad Busters‚Äô first update is packed full of content and improvements for a Global Launch like no other! ULTRA EVOLUTIONS UNLEASHED Discover fantastic new looks and fabulous new abilities with Ultra Evolutions!

  • All characters can now evolve to Ultra form and add some swagger to your Squad

  • Check out all of the 27 new Ultra Evolutions in the Squad tab in the game.

COLLECT HAMMERS & CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAZA

The Plaza Shop is open for business!

  • Buy tons of top shelf Plaza decorations from the Plaza Builder with Hammers!

  • Find Hammers in Battles, from rewards or in the Shop, and use them to build Plaza decorations!

NEW GEM PASS SEASON: MOONLIGHT MATCHUP

Get ready for a new Gem Pass season full of prizes, including the two newest MEGA Units:

  • MEGA Magical Shelly: Dazzle others with her sparkling looks and Magic Blastwand!

  • MEGA Kitsune Witch: Outfox foes with bountiful Skeleton hordes and a 3-bolt attack!

The MEGA BANK will also return this season, and no longer requires buying a Super Pass!

BALANCING UPDATES

Everyone has a place in Squad Busters, and every unique character deserves its space to shine. These updates aim to help all Squad building choices feel meaningful, and to help enable countless paths to victory!

Character balancing: Supply-focused units have improved abilities to better balance them with fighters

  • Chicken gives 1 additional Turbo Boot

  • Baby Greg chops trees slightly faster

  • Goblin gives more Coins when joining the Squad

  • Trader gives 1 additional Gem after collecting enough Coins

  • Mavis can now get Gems from Carrots in addition to Coins

Many characters have improved Health to help them last longer in fights, especially ranged units

  • +100 Health: Goblin, Chicken, Archer Queen, Witch, Shelly, Nita, Max

  • +150 Health: Bo, Colt, Wizard

  • +200 Health: Medic, Dynamike, Pam, Penny, Tank (on foot)

  • +500 Health: MEGA Dragon Chicken

Summoned unit balancing:

Witch Skeletons have consolidated strength to improve map readability and help unclog Portals

  • Witch Skeletons have much more Health, but slightly reduced maximum lifetime

  • Witches summon slightly slower, but all at once, to a maximum of 12 Skeletons at a time

  • Skeleton Spell deploys fewer Skeletons

Royale King Recruits have been drilled into shape to better guard their King

  • Royal Recruits have more damage and tons more Health

MEGA Unit balancing:

MEGA Units appear during matches less randomly, and more often when you need them (sometimes)

  • MEGA Units are now much less likely to appear for players with a high position or big Squad

    • Instead, they appear more often for Squads that have been diminished later in the match

    • Being close to getting busted and being in low position increases chances to find a MEGA

  • Fewer MEGA units will be offered during matches

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear until after 2:00 in the match

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear to Squads that already have a MEGA Unit

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear when using an Epic Key or Fusion Key

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear for a while after you refuse one from a Chest

  • MEGA units also no longer increase Chest cost, to not interfere with Squad building

Battle Mods balancing:

  • Tree Giants: now have a chance to drop The Log Spell

  • Royal Haunt: Royal Ghosts drop more loot to better reward Ghost hunters

  • Epic Overload: has been moved to Royal World

  • Super Gem Mine: has been moved to Desert World

Other balancing updates:

  • Turbo now recharges faster, so there's more running and less waiting

  • Monsters now drop more Coins later in the match, to help ease rebuilding Squads

  • Greg's Trees, Bea's Hives, and Tank's Tanks reappear faster to improve availability

  • Blue Powerup Boxes drop 1 extra Coin to enable faster match starts

  • Royal World maps spawn more Guards to help keep up the action

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES

  • Keep an eye out for Chest Doublers in events and the Shop, and get 2x Reward Chest prizes!

  • Invite friends to play Squad Busters and earn Rewards for you and your friends!

    • Check out the new Referral tab in your Friends list!

  • Daily Deals can now be refreshed in the Shop for Coins

  • The Chest Ticket refresh timer now pauses instead of resets when filling up on Chest Tickets

  • Your Squad Next Battle has been updated to have much fewer locked characters per Battle for players before Squad League

  • Other performance improvements and bug fixes

UPCOMING EVENTS & CONTENT

Pi√±ata Festival

Collect Pi√±ata Sticks with friends and earn special Rewards!

  • Look for a giant Pi√±ata visiting you Plaza for your chance to collect Pi√±ata Sticks in Battles!

  • Collect enough Pi√±ata Sticks to open Pi√±atas full of Coins and items for your Battle Bag!

  • Add friends to your Pi√±ata hunt and make progress together!

Ice World

  • 3 New Characters and 4 new Mods!

Follow our Social Media channels and your favorite Squad Busters content creators to learn more about the upcoming content!¬†

entry.title: June Update Patch Notes
entry.content:
ICE WORLD IS HERE ‚ùÑÔ∏è

It's a party on Ice! Play Ice World Maps and Battle Mods, and bust Ice Spirits to earn new Ice World Characters!

And for all the players who reached Desert World, you‚Äôll be able to play in Ice World for a week and start unlocking the new Characters!

As soon as the Event starts, you‚Äôll find a visiting Ice Spirit in your Plaza. Start busting Ice Spirits in Battles to earn many Reward Chests, including Ice Chests that guarantee Ice World Characters.

Ice World Characters ‚òÉÔ∏è

JESSIE

Builds Turrets on opened Chests and packs a powerful orb launcher!

  • Rarity: Rare

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Builds a Turret after opening a Chest

    • Classic: Jessie‚Äôs shots bounce to a nearby target

    • Super: Gives a Turret Spell

      • Turret Spell: Annoy your foes with a fast-firing Turret!

    • Ultra: Turrets shoot much faster

ICE WIZARD

Gives a Super Freeze Spell and chills enemies with frosty ice bolts.

  • Rarity: Rare

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Gives a Super Freeze Spell

      • Super Freeze Spell: Slows enemies for a longer time with an even bigger blizzard!

    • Classic: Throws an Ice Fan after 6 attacks

    • Super: Freeze Spells become Super Freeze Spells

    • Ultra: Ice Fan charges much faster

Dr. T

Dr. T is ready to unleash his infamous Mega Crab, but only after you collect enough Coins! The Mega Crab will Evolve as Dr. T Evolves, increasing its health, damage, and attack speed.

  • Rarity: Epic

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Get 10 Coins to deploy or boost his Mega Crab

    • Classic: Deploys Mega Crab Mk. 2

    • Super: Deploys Mega Crab Mk. 3

    • Ultra: Deploys Mega Crab Mk. 4

Ice World Battle Mods üßä

  • Super Ice Spirits: Giant Ice Spirits are jumping around the map

  • Golem Meteors: Sends lots of Gem-covered Golems falling from the sky

  • 1-Coin Chests: All Chests only cost 1 Coin

  • Gem Hot Pot: Pots of Gems, which spill huge amounts of Gems, for the first Squad to grab them

NEW CHARACTER: BANDIT!

Starting in July, you'll be able to unlock THE BANDIT through a special Event!

Watch for the Bandit showing up in your Plaza for a chance to unlock her! The Event will be available for players who reached Desert World.

Bandit‚Äôs Abilities are all about Gems, giving you a bunch of them when coming out of a Chest.

  • Rarity: Rare

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Gives 7 Gems

    • Classic: Gives 1 Gem when busting big Monsters

    • Super: Increases Gems given to 10

    • Ultra: Increase Gems when busting big Monsters to 2

SKINS ARE HERE üëï

You can now change your Characters‚Äô appearance by equipping a SKIN. A bunch of new Skins will be coming to the Shop in the next few weeks:

  • Tour Guide Mavis

  • Origami Barbarian King

  • Street Magic Wizard

  • Kimono Witch

  • Ninja Goblin

FREE Black Belt Chicken Skin!

Stay tuned for more information coming in July about the Community Event to unlock it!

JULY AND AUGUST GEM PASS üéüÔ∏è

IN JULY:

  • Two new MEGAs: Resort Royale King and Sunburn Barbarian

  • One Skin: Pool Party Hog Rider

IN AUGUST:

  • Two new MEGAs: Fast Food Tank Girl and Street Trader

  • One Skin: Retro Future Colt

NEW EVENTS COMING UP üóìÔ∏è

  • Unlock Bandit

Bandit is showing up in the Plaza with a challenge to collect lots of Gems. Impress her with your Gem collecting skills to unlock her for your Squad!

  • Bounty Hunt

Colt is showing up in the Plaza with bounties. Bust Colt‚Äôs most wanted Monsters and earn big Coin Rewards!

GAMEPLAY & BALANCE CHANGES üìù

After a massive launch, Squads find their groove and show their skills. A new round of balancing changes aims to keep action up, improve some underperformers, and make Battles more dynamic and rewarding!

Battle Mods ‚öîÔ∏è

  • Pi√±ata Party: Find Giant Pi√±atas full of Pi√±ata Sticks when a Pi√±ata Festival Event is active

  • Loot Surge: Find surges of Pi√±ata Sticks when a Pi√±ata Festival event is active

  • Spell Overload: Big Monsters and Bosses have increased chance to drop Spells

  • Gem Overload: Furnace Spell‚Äôs Fire Spirits no longer drop extra Gems, to not reward their targets

  • Doppelgangers: Drops from Characters are now limited to 3 Characters worth per transformation

    • This change aims curb gameplay extremes and keep Battles running smoothly

  • Ring Grab: Gem Rings are worth much more Gems, and only drop 1 at a time

Gameplay üïπÔ∏è

  • Targeting outlines now help you predict your Squad‚Äôs intentions

    • A yellow outline now shows the Squad‚Äôs current target, even while moving

    • Targeting rules are unchanged: the Squad prefers targets closest to the center of the Squad circle

  • Maps now spawn many more Monsters as the Battle progresses, including extra Bosses

  • Rare and Epic Chests in Battle have reduced chances to offer Common Characters, to make it easier to make Rare and Epic Fusions later in the Battle

  • Using a Fusion Key now puts the Battle Bag on cooldown for the rest of the Battle

    • This change aims to make stronger trade-offs and more strategic use of the Battle Bag

    • Now, waiting to use a Fusion Key will give the opportunity to use other Keys earlier

  • Comeback chances to get a MEGA from a Chest now improve when more Squads have been busted in a Battle

    • Before, chances would lower the more Squads had been busted, making comeback harder

Characters and Monsters üëæ

  • Barbarian has more Health, to help him better show off his swordplay

  • Dynamike has improved damage to keep up with healthier opponents

  • Bea Bees now last longer, and Super Bea Bees stay with her the entire Battle

  • Penny finds much more loot from hidden treasure, ensuring her riches are worthwhile

  • Chest Menace has less Health, making its stash of loot easier to bust open

  • Furnace Spells and Shrink Spells are now more likely to be found in Battle

  • Freeze Spells now have more effective slowdown, even when Turboing

  • Super Bosses from certain Battle Mods now drop more Hammers

Other improvements and fixes üîé

  • You can now earn Portal Energy just from playing from Battles

  • Single Chest Tickets now cost less Coins, and can be bought in larger stacks

  • Reward Chests now convert maxed out Characters into Portal Energy or XP, instead of being skipped

  • Chests no longer stop respawning in Battle if a Squad is busted while opening that Chest

  • Tombstones no longer block Tanks, Hives, and other Map items from spawning

  • Fixed swapping Spells with Classic Wizard would sometimes accidentally throw a Spell instead

  • Various improvements and fixes for spectating Battles

entry.title: Squad League Reset and Rewards!
entry.content:
The current Squad League season is coming to its end, and we‚Äôre very excited to announce that everyone in Squad League as of Monday, July 1st, at 07:00 UTC, will receive a Kimono Witch Skin for free! This means if you reach level 90 in the Squad Journey before Monday 07:00 UTC, you'll get the skin!

Additionally, the Top 3 players on the Global leaderboard will receive:

  • Top 1: 300,000 Coins

  • Top 2: 200,000 Coins

  • Top 3: 100,000 Coins

These rewards will be available in your shop for 30 days, so be sure to claim them!

What does the end of a season mean, and what should you expect?

With the introduction of a new World in the Squad Journey, the Squad League will move to the end of the track. Here are some important details:

  • Players currently in Squad League will remain at Squad Journey level 90.

  • Squad League will move to level 120.

  • Players will need to advance through the Squad Journey to re-enter the Squad League.

  • Players with maxed Characters will receive Portal Energy from Chests when acquiring duplicates.

    • Once in Squad League, XP will be given instead.

    • Other sources of Portal Energy: New Characters merges, Book achievements, and Battles (with a daily cap of 300 from Battles).

  • Trophies will be halved for everyone, with a maximum cap of 4000. For example, a player with 5000 trophies will be reset to 2500, while anyone with 8000 or more will be capped at 4000.

    • The reset is designed to make the Squad League leaderboards accessible to all players at the start of each new season.

  • Squad League level and Rank will not reset, meaning players will retain their current league (e.g., Silver) and continue from there once they re-enter the Squad League

Feedback and Future Plans

We've received a lot of feedback about Squad League, and although we don't currently have a reward system tied to trophies, we're definitely working on making it more exciting in the future. In the meantime, we hope this article clarifies things and that these temporary rewards make your efforts a bit more worthwhile! Thanks for your dedication! ü©∑

entry.title: Pick Chicken and earn rewards!
entry.content:
Welcome to Our First Community Event: CHICKEN RUSH!

Community events bring special in-game goals where your actions help unlock amazing rewards for everyone. For this inaugural edition, we're counting Chickens selected in battles üêî!

This means every time anyone picks a Chicken from a chest, it contributes to our collective progress, bringing everyone closer to unlocking rewards!¬†

There are five milestones with the following rewards along the way:

  • 10M Chickens: 10 Mega Dragon Chickens

  • 20M Chickens: 20 Baby Chickens

  • 50M Chickens: 20000 Coins

  • 80M Chickens: 80 Baby Chickens

  • 120M Chickens: Black Belt Chicken Skin

Follow the event progress here, in the in-game News! The rewards will be in the shop as soon as we unlock a new milestone, and the event will end in 10 days, July 18th at 7am UTC.

Let‚Äôs do this together!!!

üì∫ [EMBEDDED VIDEO]
